title: Class A Felony
description: A compelling story of lust, love, and justice, Class A Felony is a masterfully crafted novel that will keep the reader riveted from beginning to end.Chloe Loucks finds herself hopelessly entangled in a destructive relationship with an irresistible co-worker, Travis Trammel. The chemistry between the two is electric from the moment they kiss, causing Chloe to overlook his often caustic behavior. As the two become close, Travis shares secrets that Chloe finds disturbing and frightening. Just as Chloe is fighting between following her heart or her head, Travis makes the decision for her by committing an unspeakable act. The second half puts readers on edge as Chloe finds the creativity and resolve to ensure justice is servedâ€¦one way or another.
author: Deena Lee Davis
